dev-1.x.name: drupal/token_request_params

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: Take parameters passed on the URL or posted from Forms (e.g. ?key=value&key2=value2) and make them into tokens like [%key] and [%key2]. The tokens will be available for use in your content pages by using the Token Filter module.
